title: League Of Legends Collage
body:
That is the first part of my league of legends -collage ! I want to draw all the champs and create step by step a big collage! 
I hope you enjoy my drawing! ^^

replies.body: For a second I thought it was lol college. I was so excited. But gj anyways
i thought it was LOL college misspelled on purpose to show how lame that'd be. lol

Lovely artwork! The Fizz looks particularly cheerful, and the Zed looks particularly sinister. Gnar looks simply gnarly. ^_^

Can't wait to see the rest of the collage.
Nice color shading.. What kind of color pencils do you use to make such sharp and crisp colored lines?
Thank u very much ! I just use easy crayons from Faber-Castell ^^

i think we can all agree
jinx is the type of person to drop out of college

Get's get some Armordillos {{champion:33}} in there! :D

The world could use more dangerous spiky things.
